obfuscation: ﻿ A modern monarchy Sweden has been monarchy for very long time. Our history be to a large extent connected with different kings,. Queens this have ruled country.
original: ﻿ A modern monarchy  Sweden has been a monarchy for a very long time. In fact, our history is to a large extent connected with the different kings and queens that have ruled the country.

obfuscation: Even though the boundaries have changed several occasions. in wars, conflicts. Unions our monarchy has persevered.
original: Even though the boundaries have changed several times due to wars, conflicts and unions our monarchy has persevered.

obfuscation: Role of the monarch has however seen a huge transformation over latter two hundred years also the powers of rustan II wolf or Karl XII can not be compared with those of the present king Carl XIV rustan.
original: The role of the monarch has however seen a huge transformation over the last two hundred years and the powers of Gustav II Adolf or Karl XII cannot be compared with those of the present king Carl XIV Gustav.

obfuscation: The parliament be today principal legislative. Ruling body with government being the second with the Supreme Court being separated, from policy influence. It does not deal with policy matters or interfere with the laws passed by parliament.
original: The parliament is today the main legislative and ruling body with the government being the second with the Supreme Court being separated from political influence. It does not deal with political matters or interfere with the laws passed by the parliament.

obfuscation: Powers listed above all belonged to monarch a small longer than two hundred years ago. The king or queen was lawmakers, commander inside the armed forces. Key ruler inside nation.
original: The powers listed above all belonged to the monarch a little longer than two hundred years ago. The king or queen was the lawmaker, commander of the armed forces and the main ruler of the nation.

obfuscation: Swedish kings are famous of their warfare with neighbouring counties,. Soon, Battles across northern Europe in the Seventeenth, and Eighteenth centuries,. the situation is completely different today where sovereign 's powers have been reduced to none as a consequence, of parliamentary movements of the nineteenth century.
original: Swedish kings are famous of their warfare with neighbouring counties and battles throughout northern Europe in the 17th and 18th centuries, however, the situation is completely different today where the monarch's powers have been reduced to none as a consequence of the parliamentary movements of the 19th century.

obfuscation: In One thus. Eight hundred Nine, 1st reform took location when dissatisfied generals set king aside also monarch 's powers were reducing. Shared with various ruling bodies.
original: In 1809, the first reform took place when dissatisfied generals set the king aside and the monarch's powers were reduced and shared with different ruling bodies.

obfuscation: Fifty years later a reform was passed that changed the foundation inside the class-based parliament to parliament based on revenues also asset. The sovereign 's power was not changed radically during these years; but a process had started that would eventually relieve sovereign in his former duties.
original: Fifty years later a reform was passed that changed the foundation of the class-based parliament to a parliament based on income and property. The monarch's power was not changed dramatically during these years but a process had started that would eventually relieve the monarch of his former duties.

obfuscation: New form inside government had come to grow fort. It was now parliament that became the new ruling body inside national also international matters.
original: The new form of government had come to grow strong and it was now the parliament that became the new ruling body in domestic and international matters.

obfuscation: Now, As parliament took, over the liability of ruling countries it was expected of the monarch to stay neutral,. To illustrate, Not to express himself of political matters.
original: As the parliament took over the responsibility of ruling the country it was expected of the monarch to stay neutral and not to express himself in political matters.

obfuscation: Despite this fact king rustan V chose of One thus. Nine hundred Fourteen not to agree, with the existing 1st minister,, as a result of this controversy the 1st minister resigned.
original: Despite this fact king Gustav V chose in 1914 not to agree with the existing prime minister, as a result of this controversy the prime minister resigned.

Queen are fort leaders of opinion, inside various questions such as hunting also child-pornography.
original: Since then there have been no further utterances in political matters form the monarch and we expect the him to keep a low profile, even in non-political matters even though it is claimed by some people that the present king and queen are strong leaders of opinion in different matters such as hunting and child-pornography.

obfuscation: King also queen of Sweden are today merely representatives of the country who appear on official state visits. Also travel around the international creating good relationship with other countries. Putting Sweden on the map.
original: The king and queen of Sweden are today merely representatives of the country who appear on official state visits and also travel around the world creating good relations with other countries and putting Sweden on the map.

obfuscation: There be no power at all to talk about. Monarch simply receives processing that will allow him, to carry out his duties as representative in our country.
original: There is no power at all to talk about and the monarch simply receives a salary that will enable him to carry out his duties as a representative of our country.

obfuscation: Objections, critics of monarchy, claim that it is old-fashioned also not equivalent with modern society. Also this it is expensive for the the taxpayer. I do n't find this kind of criticism very well considered.
original: The opposition, the critics of the monarchy, claim that it is old-fashioned and not equivalent with the modern society and also that it is expensive for the taxpayers. I don't find this sort of criticism very well considered.

obfuscation: Sweden 's a really old countries also the monarchy 's great part in our history as well as our identity. I think it be quite unique are living inside countries where we still have a monarchy because there are not much countries that are monarchies today.
original: Firstly, Sweden is a very old country and the monarchy is a big part of our history as well as our identity. I think it is quite unique living in a country where we still have a monarchy because there are not many countries that are monarchies today.

obfuscation: When it comes to the number of democracy another modern day society the monarch does not have any political power as seen supra, all those powers have been taken long way from the monarch,. Been brought into the put your hands of people.
original: When it comes to the question of democracy and the modern day society the monarch does not have any political power as seen above, all those powers have been taken away from the monarch and been put in the hands of the people.

obfuscation: This fact: displays henceforth that a monarchy really can exist within limit in any modern democracy. Argument say that it be costly to defend also supporting the royal family 's living expenses does not appear, to hold earth.
original: This fact shows henceforth that a monarchy really can exist within the boundaries of a modern democracy. Secondly, the argument saying that it is expensive to uphold and support the royal family's living expenses does not seem to hold ground.

obfuscation: Compared to other expenditure it 's very small fraction of tax money this is paid.
original: Compared to other expenses it is a very small fraction of the tax money that is paid.

As one last thought, if we were to abolish monarchy of Sweden, what would tabloids write about!?!
original: Repairing or rebuilding the monarch's residences would add up to a big sum of money up front but it is hardly noticeable in the big economy and besides we pay so much taxes in this country that you would not be able to see the difference.
